mapper.insert: INSERT INTO parking_lot (lot_id, location, capacity, created_by, updated_by) VALUES (#{lotId}, #{location}, #{capacity}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy})
mapper.select: SELECT lot_id as lotId, location, capacity, created_by as createdBy, updated_by as updatedBy, state_type as stateType, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM parking_lot
